/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a car on the road, providing a driver's perspective of the cityscape. The street is flanked by towering buildings and skyscrapers, their glass facades reflecting the clear blue sky. A pedestrian bridge arches over the street, connecting the two sides of the city. The road itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban environment. Cars and buses are seen in motion on the road, indicating a busy day in the city. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
